item.title: Velocity Mosaics
item.description: Regional velocity mosaics created from the synthesis of all scene-pair velocities. Coverage: All major land ice Date range: 1985-present Resolution: 120 m Frequency: Monthly & Annual Available now, Beta (V01), Landsat only Get Data

item.title: Image-pair velocities
item.description: Scene-pair velocities generated from satellite optical and radar imagery. Coverage: All land ice Date range: 1985-present Resolution: 120 m Image-pair separation: 6 to 546 days Version 2 now available, Landsat only Get Data

item.title: Elevation Change
item.description: Elevation change from multi altimetry mission synthesis. Coverage: Ice sheets & ice shelves Date range: 1985-2020 Resolution: 1920 m Frequency: Monthly !! Antarctic V1!! , Ice Shelves & Greenland Summer 2022 Get Data

item.title: ITS_LIVE
item.description: A NASA MEaSUREs project to provide automated, low latency, global glacier flow and elevation change datasets.
